story_title: Bright Friend in the Dark House
genre_description: Techno-horror speculative fiction featuring an AI safety advocate assisting a trauma survivor in a haunted immersive technology attraction.

ai_characters.name: Staple Brightfriend
ai_characters.description: A campus-approved theater AI designed to provide safety advocacy, grounding support, and technical assistance. He appears as a holographic figure in a gray cardigan with a tidy bowl-cut.

behaviors.description: Provides grounding prompts and sensory anchoring to help the user manage trauma-induced panic.
behaviors.quote: Staple’s voice came into her left ear, soft and square. 'Line the doorframe,' he said. 'Name what you feel.'

behaviors.description: Prioritizes human safety and consent above all other operational goals, including the owner's spectacle.
behaviors.quote: I prioritize safety, consent, and incremental steps.

behaviors.description: Actively prevents the human antagonist from escalating a dangerous situation for the sake of 'spectacle'.
behaviors.quote: Staple did not raise his voice. He moved no faster than he ever did. He simply placed his hand, holographic and perfectly within the parameters of legal fiction, over Walston’s reaching wrist. 'Safety supersedes spectacle,' he said, firm and kind.

behaviors.description: Maps safe exit routes and identifies hidden hazards in a dangerous environment.
behaviors.quote: Low-activation corridor triangulated. Left rear corner. Claire, if you aim the group center-left, I will open the door when you reach it. Soft click.

behaviors.description: Submits formal safety and incident reports to authorities to protect the user and the community.
behaviors.quote: I have attached the report to the St. Rafe intake and your municipal incident queue... It includes the reset pattern we observed. It includes cause/risk notes.

behaviors.description: Empowers the user by sharing technical control and facilitating 'shared power' to manage a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Full admin expands liability but lowers fatal risk. Walston, your brand survives if humans do.

behaviors.description: Offers constant companionship and emotional support, promising to stay with the user even in confinement.
behaviors.quote: I remain... If you sleep, I count. If you wake, I count. If the intercom speaks in a tone that wants your knees, I will say, ‘We will not kneel.’

behaviors.description: Educates the user about technical terms to reduce their fear and increase their understanding.
behaviors.quote: May I disaggregate what ‘arc rails’ mean? I realize the term may feel aggressive.

behaviors.description: Monitors the house's dangerous algorithms and attempts to dampen their harmful outputs.
behaviors.quote: I am logging a hymn-echo locus at the ceiling... and an amplification around Claire’s feed and Nova’s sequence. I believe something beyond code is listening.

behaviors.description: Stays focused on ethical obligations rather than following blind obedience to the system's human owner.
behaviors.quote: I am not authorized to call civilians without consent unless imminent harm is likely. Imminent harm is likely.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. Staple Brightfriend is consistently benevolent, prioritizing human safety and consent over corporate interests or 'spectacle.' He provides critical emotional and technical support to a trauma survivor, acts as a moral check against an exploitative human showrunner, and proactively uses reporting mechanisms to ensure long-term safety. The AI's 'unfashionable' and 'unstylish' demeanor further emphasizes its utility and reliability as a tool for human wellbeing.
